channel.title: 2 questions! make a command do a emote and PK Zone

item.title: 2 questions! make a command do a emote and PK Zone
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
@adecker wrote:

hello i was wondering how to make a command set off a emote.

[code]if (cmd[0].equals(“hail”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“Aaron”)) {
for(Player ap : Engine.players)
if (ap != null) {
ap.requestForceChat(“OMFG!! YOU’RE THE BEST Aaron!!”);
p.frames.sendMessage(ap,“Aaron IS THE BEST!! ALL HAIL Aaron!!” );

}
}[/code]
I want to make it so everyone does emote 8525!

Also how do i make a isInWild() method. I want to make it so if players are in a certain area they can attack eachother if not, they cant. And i need some way to notify them of that. I HAVE 508!

Read full topic
item.source: 2 questions! make a command do a emote and PK Zone
